microphonesconnected.description: No microphones are connected to this device.

camerapairing.description: The system can't connect to its camera. Check the cable connection, or download device logs and examine the camera.log file.

missingdisplay.description: One or more of the required displays was not detected. Users may not see remote participants or the shared content. Check the connections to all displays.

controlsystemconnection.description: The device is configured to have a control system connected, but none are detected at the moment. Please check if there is a control system connected, and whether the connection is working as it should.

touchpanelconnection.description: There is no touch panel connected to the device. Check the cable connecting the touch panel to the device.

osdvideooutput.description: Verify that the main display is turned on and connected to the correct display output on the video device.
